trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 代表用於呈現項目集合的控制項。

trans-unit.source: An ItemsControl is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> that can contain multiple items, such as strings, objects, or other elements.
trans-unit.target: ItemsControl 是一種<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>可以包含多個項目，例如字串、 物件或其他項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control that contains the following different types of items: - A string.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>包含下列項目不同類型的控制項:-字串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.DateTime>物件。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> control that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>包含<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock></xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>控制項</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: ![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") ListBox that contains multiple types of objects Use either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to specify the collection to use to generate the content of your ItemsControl.
trans-unit.target: ![以四種類型的內容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "四種類型的內容與清單方塊")清單方塊中，其中包含多個類型的物件使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性來指定要用於產生您 ItemsControl 內容的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property to any type that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>，用來實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>任何類型的屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is typically used to display a data collection or to bind an ItemsControl to a collection object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>通常用來顯示資料集合，或繫結 ItemsControl 的集合物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to use an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> to populate the ItemsControl, you can add items by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想使用該物件會實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>填入 ItemsControl，您可以加入項目使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The items in an ItemsControl can have different types.
trans-unit.target: ItemsControl 中的項目可以具有不同的類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> can contain one item that is a string and another item that is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>只能包含一個項目，是一個字串和其他項目，為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection is set to read-only and fixed-size.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>集合設為唯讀和固定大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that you cannot add items to the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，您無法將項目加入集合直接。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>, which will be an empty <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>正在使用中，將屬性設定為`null`移除集合，並還原使用量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>，這將成為空白<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each ItemsControl type has a corresponding item container type.
trans-unit.target: 每個 ItemsControl 類型都有對應的項目容器類型。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding item container for each ItemsControl appends `Item` to its name.
trans-unit.target: 每個 ItemsControl 的對應項目容器附加`Item`為其名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the item containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，項目容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它們是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly create a container type for each item in the ItemsControl, but it is not necessary.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地建立每個項目的容器類型在 ItemsControl 中但不需要。

trans-unit.source: When you do not explicitly create the container type, one is generated that contains a data item in the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 當未明確建立的容器類型時，其中一個會產生包含項目集合中的資料項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you bind a collection of string objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, you do not explicitly create <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> objects, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> will generate one for each string.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您將繫結到字串物件的集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，您無法明確建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>物件，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>產生另一個用於每個字串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access a generated item container by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用來存取產生的項目容器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Certain features of UI Automation do not work correctly when an ItemsControl contains duplicate objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的使用者介面自動化某些功能無法正常運作時 ItemsControl 包含重複的物件。

trans-unit.source: If an object appears multiple times, only the first instance appears in the automation tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件出現多次時，第一個執行個體會出現在自動化樹狀目錄中。

trans-unit.source: (Two objects **x** and **y** are considered to be duplicates if `Object.Equals(x, y)` returns `true`.) > > While an object **x** is in use by an ItemsControl the value returned by **x.**`GetHashCode()`
trans-unit.target: (兩個物件**x**和**y**會被視為重複項目如果`Object.Equals(x, y)`傳回`true`。) >> 時物件**x**所傳回的值正在使用 ItemsControl **x。**`GetHashCode()`

trans-unit.source: must not change.
trans-unit.target: 必須不會變更。

trans-unit.source: Changes to this value are unsupported, and lead to unpredictable behavior.
trans-unit.target: 變更此值是不受支援，並且會導致無法預期的行為。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified object as the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的物件為子系<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為子系的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified text string to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的文字字串至<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The string to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of alternating item containers in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>, which enables alternating containers to have a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中的交替項目容器數目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>，它可讓交替容器具有獨特的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The AlternationCount and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers.
trans-unit.target: AlternationCount 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性可讓您指定兩個或多個替代項目容器的外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定替代的背景色彩，每個第三個項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is assigned to each item container in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>指派給<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>每個項目容器</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> begins at 0, increments until it is AlternationCount minus 1, and then restarts at 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>從 0 開始，直到 AlternationCount 減 1，然後再重新啟動 0 遞增。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if AlternationCount is 3 and there are seven items in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the following table lists the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for each item.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 AlternationCount 為 3，7 中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>下, 表列出<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>每個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: One method is to bind properties of the items container to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個方法是將項目容器的屬性繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>來指定哪個值應該套用到具有特定的項目容器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用觸發程序來變更項目容器的屬性，其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值而定的值

trans-unit.source: The number of alternating item containers in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的交替項目容器數<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationCount*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the initialization of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> object is about to start.
trans-unit.target: 表示初始化<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>物件即將啟動。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.PrepareContainerForItemOverride*> method.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會復原的效果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.PrepareContainerForItemOverride*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.PrepareContainerForItemOverride*>

trans-unit.source: The base implementation does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 基底實作沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.target: 容器項目。

trans-unit.target: 項目。

trans-unit.target: 傳回屬於目前的容器<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>擁有給定項目。

trans-unit.target: 要與目前所屬的容器， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>擁有給定項目或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有這樣的容器存在。

trans-unit.target: 傳回屬於指定的容器<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>擁有給定的容器項目。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>来傳回的容器。

trans-unit.source: The element to return the container for.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回容器的項目。

trans-unit.source: The container that belongs to the specified that owns the given element, if itemsControl is not .
trans-unit.target: 屬於指定的容器擁有指定的項目，如果 itemsControl 不 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a path to a value on the source object to serve as the visual representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，做為物件的視覺表示法的來源物件上的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This property is a simple way to define a default template that describes how to display the data objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是簡單的方式來定義描述如何顯示資料物件的預設範本。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The path to a value on the source object.
trans-unit.target: 來源物件上值的路徑。

trans-unit.source: This can be any path, or an XPath such as "@Name".
trans-unit.target: 這可以是任何路徑或 XPath，例如"@Name"。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.DisplayMemberPath*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 表示初始化<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>物件已完成。

trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>指定的物件。

trans-unit.target: 要從中取得物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Creates or identifies the element that is used to display the given item.
trans-unit.target: 建立或識別用來顯示給定項目的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the given item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示給定項目的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that the specified element hosts items for.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>指定的項目裝載項目。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A> is set to `true` on `element` in a style or if `element` is a panel created by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter> for an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is returned; otherwise, `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A>設`true`上`element`樣式中或如果`element`所建立的面板<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>會傳回，否則`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost%2A>

trans-unit.source: The host element.
trans-unit.target: 裝載項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that the specified element hosts items for, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>指定的項目裝載項目，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle"></xref> objects that define the appearance of each level of groups.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle"></xref>定義的每個群組層級外觀的物件。

trans-unit.source: The entry at index 0 describes the top-level groups, the entry at index 1 describes the next level, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 索引 0 處之項目的描述最上層群組，位於索引 1 的項目描述下一個層級，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: If there are more levels of grouping than entries in the collection, the last entry is used for the extra levels.
trans-unit.target: 如果有更多的層級的群組集合中的項目比，最後一個項目會使用額外的層級。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *OneOrMoreGroupStyleObjects* One or more objects.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性項目用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*OneOrMoreGroupStyleObjects*一或多個物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether case is a condition when searching for items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出要搜尋的項目時，大小寫是否也是條件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, the IsTextSearchCaseSensitive property specifies whether the case determines whether an item is selected in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchEnabled%2A>屬性設定為`true`，IsTextSearchCaseSensitive 屬性會指定是否案例會決定是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>選取一個項目</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.IsTextSearchEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> contain two strings that differ only in case, such as "ITEM" and "item", the first string will always be selected, regardless of the case of the input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>包含兩個只有大小寫不同，例如"ITEM"和"item"，第一個字串一律會選取，不區分大小寫的輸入的字串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if text searches are case-sensitive; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文字搜尋區分大小寫。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> that is copied to each item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref>複製到每個項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you set the ItemBindingGroup property, each item container gets a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> that has the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> objects as the ItemBindingGroup, but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>, are specific to the data for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目容器時設定 ItemBindingGroup 屬性，取得<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>具有相同的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>物件做為 ItemBindingGroup，但屬性描述繫結，例如<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A>、 特有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>中每個項目的資料</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.BindingExpressions%2A></xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Items%2A>中的資料</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule></xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: You must access the item container's <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A> to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item.
trans-unit.target: 您必須存取項目容器的<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>執行作業例如驗證資料，並檢查是否有錯誤的項目。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BindingGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref> that is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref>與控制項相關聯。

trans-unit.source: An ItemContainerGenerator is responsible for generating the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] for its host, such as an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: ItemContainerGenerator 是負責產生[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]對於其主控件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: It maintains the association between the items in the data view of the control and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: 它會維護資料的檢視控制項中的項目與對應的關聯<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> has an associated item container that contains a data item in the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>具有相關聯的項目容器，其中包含項目集合中的資料項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ItemContainerGenerator property to access the item container that is associated with your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ItemContainerGenerator 屬性來存取您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>相關聯的項目容器

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a data-bound <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> control and you want to get a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> based on its index or its associated data item, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>控制項，而且您想要取得<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem>根據索引或其相關聯的資料的項目，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to get the index or data item that is associated with a given generated container element.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法來取得的索引或資料的項目，指定產生之容器項目相關聯。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.ItemFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator> interface is also used in advanced scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator>介面也用在進階案例中。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator>

trans-unit.source: Typically, advanced applications that have their own implementation of a virtualizing panel call members of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，有自己的虛擬化的面板實作的進階應用程式呼叫介面的成員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"></xref> that is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemContainerGenerator"> </xref>與控制項相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to the container element generated for each item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>套用至每個項目產生的容器項目。

trans-unit.source: You use this property or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>屬性設定會影響包含資料的項目之項目的外觀樣式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，產生的容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它們是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>視覺自訂提供很大的彈性並提供許多設定樣式和範本的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: To affect the layout of the items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要影響的項目配置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用群組控制項，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the visualization of data objects, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定資料物件的視覺效果，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about when to specify an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關何時指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*ResourceExtension*下列其中之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: Unless the styles themselves contain references to potential run-time references such as system resources or user preferences, `StaticResource` reference to a style is usually recommended for performance.
trans-unit.target: 除非樣式本身包含的系統資源或使用者偏好設定，例如潛在的執行階段參考的參考，否則`StaticResource`參考樣式，通常建議使用的效能。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets custom style-selection logic for a style that can be applied to each generated container element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可以套用至每個產生的容器項目的樣式的自訂樣式選取邏輯。

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: 您使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性設定會影響包含資料的項目之項目的外觀樣式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，產生的容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它們是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one style defined and need to supply logic to choose which one to apply, then you use the ItemContainerStyleSelector property instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有多個樣式定義，而且需要提供邏輯，以選擇要套用，則使用 ItemContainerStyleSelector 屬性，而不是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property is set.

trans-unit.source: A common scenario is to use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> to display a data collection, or to bind an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to a collection object.
trans-unit.target: 常見的案例是使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>，或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView>顯示資料收集，或繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>集合物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: To bind an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to a collection object, use the ItemsSource property.
trans-unit.target: 若要繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>集合物件，使用 ItemsSource 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Note that the ItemsSource property supports <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> binding by default.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，ItemsSource 屬性支援<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>預設繫結。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>

trans-unit.source: When the ItemsSource property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection is made read-only and fixed-size.
trans-unit.target: 當設定 ItemsSource 屬性時，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>集合由唯讀和固定大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: When ItemsSource is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>, which will be an empty <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 當 ItemsSource 正在使用中時，將屬性設定為`null`移除集合，並還原<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>，這將成為空白<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemCollection></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>使用量

trans-unit.source: When ItemsSource is not in use, the value of this property is `null`, and setting it to `null` has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 當 ItemsSource 不在使用中時，這個屬性的值會是`null`，並將它設定為`null`沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In most cases you do not need to implement your own collections.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下，您不需要實作您自己的集合。

trans-unit.source: Instead, consider using <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> or other existing collections.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，請考慮使用<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>或其他現有的集合。</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> is bound to a collection object and you do not provide specific display instructions using a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>, the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] of each item is a string representation of each object in the underlying collection.

trans-unit.source: When you set an ItemTemplate on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is generated as follows (using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> as an example): 1.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the container is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> 、

trans-unit.source: The generator calls back into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> to prepare the container.
trans-unit.target: 產生器會呼叫回<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>準備容器。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Part of the preparation involves the copying of the ItemTemplate of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to be the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: 準備過程中的牽涉到複製<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>的 ItemTemplate

trans-unit.source: Similar to all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> types, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: 類似於所有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>型別，而<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>的</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: When the template is applied, it creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> whose <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> is bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>.
trans-unit.target: 套用範本時，它會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> applies that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> to itself, and that creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 最後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>套用，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>本身，並可建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> defined and you want to supply logic to programmatically choose and apply a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一個以上的<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>定義，而且您想要提供以程式設計方式選擇，並套用邏輯<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>視覺自訂提供很大的彈性並提供許多設定樣式和範本的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A>屬性設定會影響包含資料的項目之項目的外觀樣式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyleSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, the generated containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls; for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, they are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，產生的容器是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>，它們是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: To affect the layout of the items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要影響的項目配置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsPanel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are using grouping on your control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用群組控制項，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyleSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.GroupStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), or [DynamicResource Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*ResourceExtension*下列其中之一︰ [StaticResource 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，或[DynamicResource 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Unless the styles themselves contain references to potential run-time references such as system resources or user preferences, [StaticResource Markup Extension](../Topic/StaticResource%20Markup%20Extension.md) reference to a style is usually recommended for performance.
trans-unit.target: 除非樣式本身包含的系統資源或使用者偏好設定，例如潛在的執行階段參考的參考，否則[StaticResource 標記延伸](../Topic/StaticResource%20Markup%20Extension.md)參考樣式，通常建議使用的效能。

trans-unit.target: *TemplateResourceKey*[X:key 指示詞](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)參考做為資源所要求的範本字串值。
